
# I always install these packages on my machines.

```shell
apt install acl ansible apt-transport-https autoconf autopoint automake \
ca-certificates chrony curl dnsutils dstat fio git glusterfs-client \
glusterfs-cli gnupg gnupg-agent htop jq libtool lsb-release ncdu net-tools \
nfs-common parted pkg-config psmisc pv python3 python3-dev python3-pip \
python3-virtualenv qemu-guest-agent rsync screen smartmontools \
software-properties-common sysstat sudo traceroute tree ufw unison unzip vim \
wget zsh -y
```
